Package camzup.core

Class Random

java.lang.Object
java.util.Random
camzup.core.Random
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUtils, java.io.Serializable
public class Random
extends java.util.Random
implements IUtils
An extension of java.util.Random . This is mostly for convenience in the Processing IDE.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Random

      public Random()
      The default constructor. Sets the seed to the system's current time in milliseconds.
      See Also:
      System.currentTimeMillis()
